NpcBrains:Traits.trait: A \$(bookworm) says {quietly|remarks|whispers|comments|mentions in a hushed tone|whispers}, \$(talk)

NpcBrains:Brains.NpcBrains:Brain: <NpcBrains:Traits trait="book=A \$(bookworm) {replies quietly|responds}, \"I don't know if we have that {book|tome|text} here.\""/>

NpcBrains:Traits.trait: Remember, we close at five bells.
Is there {a particular|a specific|some} {book|tome|text} I can find for you?
Perhaps I can reshelve that for you?
\$(emote-feline)A \$(canine) {makes a half-hearted lunge at|tries to pounce on} a \$(feline), but it scurries away{ safely|}.
\$(emote-rodent)A \$(canine) {makes a half-hearted lunge at||tries to pounce on} a \$(rodent), but it scurries away{ safely|}.
\$(emote-human)A \$(canine) rubs against the legs of a \$(human).
\$(emote-foodworker)A \$(canine) stands looking up at a \$(human) expectantly.
A \$(canine) lies down in the corner.
A \$(canine) lies down near the exit.
A \$(canine) lies down, with its head raised alertly.
\$(kill-feline)A \$(canine) growls briefly at a \$(feline), which quickly leaves.
\$(kill-rodent)A \$(canine)pads over towards a \$(rodent), which rapidly leaves.
\$(emote-Athos)A \$(canine) wags its tail while watching Athos.

Gareth=A \$(canine) {wags its tail happily upon seeing|looks up expectantly at} Gareth.

Sir Petris=A \$(canine) {carefully watches|tenses upon seeing|raises its hackles upon seeing|narrows its eyes at|stares in an unfriendly manner at} Sir Petris.

kicks=A \$(canine) easily dodges the kick from \$(PC).
punches=A \$(canine) easily dodges the punch from \$(PC).
head-butts=A \$(canine) easily withstands the head-butt from \$(PC).
bites=A \$(canine) looks on bemusedly as \$(PC) tries to bite through thick, wiry fur.
touches=A \$(canine) rubs its head agaist the hand of \$(PC).
teases=A \$(canine) {ignores the teasing by|looks quizzically up at} \$(PC).
menaces=A \$(canine) doesn't seem to find \$(PC) very menacing.
abuses=A \$(canine) stoically withstands the abuse of \$(PC).
pets=A \$(canine) wags his tail{ at the touch of \$(PC)| happily| contentedly| slowly| softly|}.
cuddles=A \$(canine) sits solidly while being cuddled by \$(PC).
pats=A \$(canine) wags his tail {happily |}when patted by \$(PC).
strokes=A \$(canine) sits panting while stroked by \$(PC).
rubs=A \$(canine) stands solidly while being rubbed by \$(PC).
scratches=A \$(canine) wags its tail as \$(PC) scratches it.
grabs=A \$(canine) stands unmoved by a grasp attempt by \$(PC).
slaps=A \$(canine) glares after receiving a slap from \$(PC).
A \$(carpenter) {messes with|fiddles with|works with|looks at|stares at|adjusts|gently moves} his {materials|tools|lumber}.
A \$(carpenter) {shaves|planes|hoists|carves a notch in|saws a piece off of|trims|hammers} a {piece|bit|chunk} of {lumber|wood|oak}.
A \$(carpenter) {messes with|fiddles with|works with|looks at|stares at|adjusts|gently moves} his {materials|tools|lumber}.
A \$(carpenter) {shaves|planes|hoists|carves a notch in|saws a piece off of|trims|hammers} a {piece|bit|chunk} of {lumber|wood|oak}.

NpcBrains:Brains.NpcBrains:Brain: <NpcBrains:Traits trait="A \$(carpenter) replies, \"Sorry, we're too busy with these repairs!\""/>

<NpcBrains:Traits trait="doing=A \$(carpenter) {replies|responds}, \"We are working here, by the Seneschal's orders.\""/> <NpcBrains:Traits trait="done=A \$(carpenter) {replies|responds}, \"The work will be done {in good time.|when it's ready.}\""/> <NpcBrains:Traits trait="finished=A \$(carpenter) {replies|responds}, \"{When it's done.|Not for a while yet.|Well, that depends ...}\""/>
<NpcBrains:Traits trait="queen=A \$(carpenter) {replies|responds}, \"{Long may Her Majesty reign.|Bless her pointy ears, yes.|May Her Majesty's reign last forever!}\""/>

NpcBrains:Traits.trait: By the Queen's {eyes|hair|shoes|ears|voice}, I can't get {this|any of these} to fit{!|.}
Why {do I always have to|must I always|cannot someone else} {hold this|do this|do that|fetch up more lumber}?
Be a good lad and {hold that|hold this|put that down|come over here}.
All these changes ordered, it makes one's head spin.
Secret doors ... what a lot of rubbish. Never saw one yet that worked proper.
Just when {we|I} think we've finished changing things, they must be changed again.
{Excuse me, there.|Pardon our dust, work we must.}
{One|Two|Three} more {of these|of those|layer|set} and we lay off for {the day,|a break,|a bit to eat,} lads.
Ser Martel is a handsome one, no wonder all the seras buzz about him so. But I hear it is Apprentice Elea who he was seen gifting with a most elegant set of clothes.
We'll burn that bridge when we get to it.
A \$(clothesworker) finishes another {garment|article of clothing|item of vestment}.
Lady Berthe requested a honey colored {gown|surcoat} so Peaches' hair wouldn't show up as well.
Oh, would you like it in another color?
Sure and it looks lovely on you!
Do we have any more in this {style|fabric|color}?
Is this the last of it?
You look good enough to see the Queen, you do.
This is a rush job for the court.
You'll have to take it apart and do it over again.
Armondo's mark was caught on yet another set of clothes someone was wearing above Mistress Ermengarde's restrictions.
All these recent promotions, my {fingers|needles|nerves} are worn down.
Nothing happened on the battlements last night.
I don't know nothing about Brethe and no babies..

A {crumhorn player|shawm player|tabor player|timbrel player} keeps time.
A timbrel player {bangs|beats} his instrument {rhythmically|rapidly}{|, the cymbals and bells jingling{| merrily}}.

A shawm player {makes a high-pitched {squeaking|trill} with her instrument|plays a series of slow, high notes}.
The musicians {play {a slow dance tune|a dance tune|to a steady tempo}|accompany one another in a {slow dance|stately} tune}.

\$(emote-cat)A \$(foodworker) feeds a tidbit to a small \$(cat).
This is far too good for the likes of them.
They can't get enough of these.
Lady Berthe is on another diet?
Don't tell Lady Berthe but I've been sneaking treats to Peaches.

{{They send|They only send|The inner bailey only sends}|{They never send|The inner bailey never sends}} {coarse flour|poor cuts of meat|the finest flour|fresh vegetables} for the other kitchen; {it's rather a shame, don't you think?|that's rather a good thing.|I can certainly understand that.}

\$(emote-human)A \$(human) {winks|laughs|gasps|nods|gazes|peers perplexedly|peers|glances quickly|glances|glares covertly|glares briefly|glares|grins|grins broadly|frowns|frowns in disgust|smiles|looks|points} at a \$(human).

NpcBrains:Brains.NpcBrains:Brain:
<NpcBrains:Traits trait="answer=A \$(human) {replies|responds} {carefully|proudly|indignantly}, \"{Good enough for you.|It is all the answer I've got.|Yes, and the answer is no.}\""/>
<NpcBrains:Traits trait="air=A \$(human) {replies|responds} {calmly|testily|wearily}, \"{It's cold that the air is.|In the air?|No, perhaps the rock.}\""/>
<NpcBrains:Traits trait="year=A \$(human) {replies|responds}, \"{I'm sure I don't know.|Hmm, how long has it been ... ?|I can't say as how I remember.}\""/> <NpcBrains:Traits trait="years=A \$(human) {replies|responds}, \"{I'm sure I don't remember.|Hmm, how long has it been ... ?|There's nobody in the Castle what knows ... excepting perhaps Her Majesty.}\""/>
<NpcBrains:Traits trait="queen=A \$(human) {replies|responds}, \"{Long may Her Majesty reign.|All hail Her Majesty ...|May Her Majesty's reign last forever!}\""/>

\$(emote-femaleworker)A \$(maleworker) {winks|laughs|gasps|nods|gazes|peers perplexedly|peers|glances quickly|glances|glares covertly|glares briefly|glares|grins|grins broadly|frowns|frowns in disgust|smiles|looks|points} at a \$(femaleworker).

A {crumhorn player|shawm player|tabor player|timbrel player} keeps time.
A timbrel player {bangs|beats} his instrument {rhythmically|slowly}{|, the cymbals and bells jingling{| merrily}}.
A crumhorn player {makes a {deep |}{droning, buzzing|droning|buzzing} noise on his instrument|plays a slow, bleating {tune|melody|waltz}.}
A tabor player {beats|bangs} her drum{| slowly} and {tootles|blows} a stately {melody|waltz tune|tune} on her {simple|} pipe.
A tabor player {beats|bangs} her drum{| slowly| regularly| rhythmically}.
A tabor player {tootles|blows} a stately {melody|waltz|tune} on her {simple|} pipe.
A shawm player {makes a high-pitched {squeaking|trill} with her instrument|plays a series of slow, high notes}.
The musicians {play {a slow dance tune|a waltz|to a steady tempo}|accompany one another in a {waltz|stately} tune}.
Queen Vivienne=A \$(messenger) bows{| graciously| deeply| formally} to {the Queen|Her Majesty the Queen|Queen Vivienne|Her Majesty, Queen Vivienne}.
Prince Bertram=A \$(messenger) bows{| graciously| deeply| formally} to {Prince Bertram|Prince Bertram|His Highness, Prince Bertram}.
Prince Gervaise=A \$(messenger) bows{| graciously| deeply| formally} to {Prince Gervaise|Prince Gervaise|His Highness, Prince Gervaise}.
Princess Jilayne=A \$(messenger) bows{| graciously| deeply| formally} to {Princess Jilayne|Princess Jilayne|Her Highness, Princess Jilayne}.
Sir Auster=A \$(messenger) bows{| graciously| deeply| formally} to Sir Auster.
Lord Boreas=A \$(messenger) bows{| graciously| deeply| formally} to {the Chancellor|Sir Boreas|the Lord Chancellor|Chancellor Boreas}.
Sir Launfal=A \$(messenger) bows{| graciously| deeply| formally} to {the Chamberlain|Sir Launfal|the Lord Chamberlain|Chamberlain Launfal}.
A \$(messenger) replies, `Sorry, I have no time to speak!`
A \$(messenger) looks at \$(PC) and says, `I'm afraid I don't understand.`

NpcBrains:Brains.NpcBrains:Brain: <NpcBrains:Traits trait="queen=A \$(messenger) {replies|responds}, \"{Long may Her Majesty reign.|All hail Her Majesty ...|May Her Majesty's reign last forever!}\""/>

NpcBrains:Traits.trait: By the Queen's {eyes|hair|shoes|voice}, I knew I should have taken the other {stairs|passage}{!|.}
Why {do I always have to|must I always|cannot someone else} deliver {missives|scrolls|messages} to {Prince Bertram|Lady Hieronyma|Doctor Getheaht}?
Another {foolish poem|love letter|vague threat|death threat|anonymous letter}? How many of these must I deliver in a single day?
All these new people in the {inner bailey|outer bailey|castle|court}; it's very confusing.
I wish some of these secret doors people are talking about would work for me.
I must deliver this scroll to {Lady Amoret|Lord Launfal}.
Just when {we|I} think we've figured out where everyone is staying, they move again.
Excuse me, have you seen {Lord Launfal|Sir Petris|Sir Alrik|Ser Athos|Dame Catharsis|Lady Valeria|Gwen|Doctor Mielyr|Master Orson|the Seneschal|Severin|Master Quilp|Master Howel}?
My goodness, I have an awful lot of undelivered scrolls{ ...|;} the Seneschal will be so angry with me.
I must deliver this scroll to {Lady Amoret|Lord Launfal}.
I must deliver this scroll to {Lady Amoret|Lord Launfal}.
A {crumhorn player|shawm player|tabor player|timbrel player} keeps time.
A timbrel player {bangs|beats} his instrument {rhythmically|quickly}{|, the cymbals and bells jingling{| merrily}}.
A crumhorn player {makes a {deep |}{droning, buzzing|droning|buzzing} noise on his instrument|plays a rapid, bleating {tune|melody|dance tune}.
A tabor player {beats|bangs} her drum{| quickly} and {tootles|blows a merry {melody|dance tune|tune} on her {simple|} pipe.
A tabor player {beats|bangs} her drum{| quickly| rapidly| rhythmically}.
A tabor player {tootles|blows a merry {melody|dance tune|tune} on her {simple|} pipe.
A shawm player {makes a high-pitched {squeaking|trill} with her instrument|plays a rapid series of brilliant notes}.
The musicians {play {a lively dance tune|a merry tune|to a rising tempo}|accompany one another in a {merry|lively} tune}.
A {merry|cheeful|lively} {melody|tune|dance tune} is {produced|played} by the musicians.
A \$(monkey) smoothly skates out the trapdoor with a message, and quickly returns.
A \$(monkey) ooks, looks aghast. and hides behind the bar.
A \$(monkey) arranges the drinks on the bar in an inscrutable pattern.
A \$(monkey) suddenly scampers about the room, throwing drinks randomly. He suddenly stops, and goes back to work pretending nothing happened.
A \$(monkey) gazes silently at the room.
A \$(monkey) idly polishes a glass with his tail.
A \$(monkey) pointlessly hangs from the ceiling.
A \$(monkey) frowns at a spot on a glass, and determinedly wipes it away.
A \$(monkey) tisks disapprovingly at nothing in particular.
A \$(monkey) yawns wearily, quickly covering his mouth.
A \$(monkey) ops up to his perch and takes a small nap.
A \$(monkey) dreams longily of the jungle.
A \$(monkey) takes a sip of beer when he thinks no one is watching.
A \$(monkey) sits down behind the bar.
A \$(monkey) sits on top of the bar.
A \$(monkey) dreams longingly of the jungle.
kicks=A \$(monkey) casually dodges the kick from \$(PC), and unperturbedly straightens his butler outfit.
punches=A \$(monkey) casually dodges the punch from \$(PC), and unperturbedly straightens his butler outfit.
head-butts=A \$(monkey) casually dodges the head-butt from \$(PC), and unperturbedly straightens his butler outfit.
teases=A \$(monkey) easily ignores the teasing by \$(PC).
menaces=A \$(monkey) doesn't seem to find \$(PC) very menacing.
kisses=A \$(monkey) fussily wipes his cheek, and glares icily at \$(PC).
I'm too good for this job.
I cannot believe I left the jungles for this.
The Castle is dreadful for lice.
Does this suit make me look fat?
We try to keep such behaviour to a minimum.
If one more person asks if my favourite drink is banana dacquiris, I quit.
One more day like this, and I quit.
One more comment like that, and I quit.
For a treehouse, there is a remarked absence of trees.
I am protected by Her Majesty's Capitulary, you know.
A fly will not go into a closed mouth. Whatever that means.
Roller-skating is a lot harder than it looks.
What may I do for you?
A \$(parakeet) methodically preens its colorful wings and breast with its beak.
A \$(parakeet) flutters its wings softly, as if considering taking off, but seems to decide against it.
A \$(parakeet) {tucks|hides|puts|folds} its head under its wing {embarrassedly|sleepily|drowsily|lazily|babblingly}.
A \$(parakeet) seems to be talking to itself. Then it stops, and turns its eye to look at you {curiously|hesitantly|suspiciously|boredly}.
A \$(parakeet) suddenly begins to squawk as if something invisible just spooked it. Then it settles down, leaving its feathers slightly ruffled.
pets=A \$(parakeet) squawks unsurely as \$(PC) pets it.
chirps=The \$(parakeet) {chirps sadly, as if it was somewhere far, far away.|chirps melifluously in reply. Its musical warble is delightful and cheery.}

whistles=The \$(parakeet) listens to \$(PC) whistle, then {whistles melodically and trills charmingly|lets out a low whistle of its own. It blinks and raises a foot unsurely|chatters incessantly, as if you were fluent in bird-speak|turns its head curiously, but remains utterly silent|squawks once, as if agitated}.
A \$(pegasine) briefly flaps its huge wings.
A \$(pegasine) stands with its wings partly outstretched.
A \$(pegasine) causes a brief gust of wind by flapping its wings slowly.
Queen Vivienne=A \$(pegasine) looks reverently at {the Queen|Her Majesty the Queen|Queen Vivienne|Her Majesty, Queen Vivienne}.
Lord Liriope=A \$(pegasine) looks reverently at Lord Liriope.

A \$(reptile) lies down on the ground.
A \$(reptile) stares at nothing in particular.
A \$(reptile) curls up on the ground.

A \$(soldier) {gazes about|gazes satisfiedly about|relaxes|listens intently|pauses|pauses and looks about|hesitates|shivers|straightens|slumps|winks|laughs|gasps|nods|coughs|hums|yawns|looks sleepy|mutters inaudibly|mutters something inaudible|murmurs inaudibly|murmurs something inaudible|shrugs perplexedly|shrugs uncaringly|shrugs|blinks|stretches exhaustedly|stretches|glares covertly|glares briefly|glares|grimaces|grimaces angrily|grins|grins broadly|frowns|frowns in disgust|smiles|smiles happily|smiles sadly|sighs|groans|sniffs|concentrates for a moment|looks about absentmindedly|pauses for a moment|looks about the area|scans the area|seems to be looking for something|}.

\$(emote-messenger)A \$(soldier) {winks|laughs|gasps|nods|gazes|peers perplexedly|peers|glances quickly|glances|glares covertly|glares briefly|glares|grins|grins broadly|frowns|frowns in disgust|smiles|looks|points} at a \$(messenger).

Queen Vivienne=A \$(soldier) salutes {the Queen|Her Majesty the Queen|Queen Vivienne|Her Majesty, Queen Vivienne}.
Prince Bertram=A \$(soldier) salutes {Prince Bertram|Prince Bertram|His Highness, Prince Bertram}.
Prince Gervaise=A \$(soldier) salutes {Prince Gervaise|Prince Gervaise|His Highness, Prince Gervaise}.
Princess Jilayne=A \$(soldier) salutes {Princess Jilayne|Princess Jilayne|Her Highness, Princess Jilayne}.

\$(tele)A \$(soldier) drags \$(PC) off to find some clothes.
I can't let you do that.
Sorry, I can't let you pass.
It is a fine day, it is.
Now that's a very funny one.
I was just thinking about you.
A fly will not go into a closed mouth.
The waiting is the hardest part.
You are a very bold boy.
Don't interfere with matters that don't concern you.
Must say, I like the Captain's idea of hiring women.
How does the weather look today?
I'm a bit peckish, I am.
It is a fine day, it is.
I understand it snowed last night.
I'm as happy as can be.
I wish this work were done.
I am going to bed soon.
I was just thinking about you.
I have lots of work to do.
A fly will not go into a closed mouth.
There's a black sheep even in the whitest flock.
There is no cure for love but marriage.
It is the cure of the hangover to drink again.
Cheer up, it is not the end of the world.
The waiting is the hardest part.
When the pony dies, the ride is over.
The castle was not built in a day.
Death is just a part of life -- the dull part.
It's a new life every day.
You are a very bold boy.
The hall was in a desperate state today.
Don't interfere with matters that don't concern you.
It's said, the new Queen's Speaker writes so large because something else is so small.
I'm told there was a big arrest in the Inner Bailey. A ritualistic sex cult I think.
I heard one of the Keepers found it and they haven't reported it to the guild yet.
Nothing happened on the battlements last night.
